item.description:
There are 3 beaches to choose from; Pier Beach, Whaleback Beach, and Rocky Beach. Parts of the actual fort are exposed and able to be explored.

We will start the hike at 2 PM where I circled the "A" in red on the enclosed map

CARPOOLING at 1 PM from Massabesic Baseball Field Parking lot: 18 Londonderry Turnpike, Manchester, NH
Google Map Directions from Massabesic to Fort Foster.

If the weather is not cooperative for a beach day, but still OK for a hike we can opt to hike around Massabesic after we meet at the baseball parking lot.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Beach Day at Fort Foster in Kittery Point, Maine
